entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Runtime.Tests test failires in CI #83655
  • watchdog still seems to be killing test runs too early #83654
  • JIT: Missing unsigned check for recent `x < 0` optimization #83653
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Create System.Text.Parsing #83652
  • MacOS - System.Net.Security - No usable version of libssl was found #83650
  • [NixOS] ping utility not found #83649
  • The data annotation error message not in the same style #83642
  • Issue involving GetPropertyItem / PropertyItems and Nikon cameras #83641

Closed

  • ToFrozenDictionary doesn't respect custom equality comparer #83645
    8.0.0
  • Http Client "Cannot write more bytes to the buffer than the configured maximum buffer size: 2147483647." #83647
  • [RISC-V Port] runtime_invoke_virtual call the uncompiled function object:Finalize() #82010
  • HostFxr loading assembly for each call to load_assembly_and_get_function_pointer #83071

PullRequests

Created

  • [JIT] ARM64 - Fix 'x < 0' for unsigned #83656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX support by default #83648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: [naot] Testing reverse pinvokes #83646
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Handle recursive type graphs in config binding generator #83644
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Fix missing comparer when creating FrozenDictionary #83651
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • Update xarch to track more instruction metadata as flags #83473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add async post to deep-dive-blog-posts.md #83506
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Proper type name parser for native AOT compiler #83657
    NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Unify managed runtime type name parsers #83484
    area-System.Reflection
  • Add vectorization to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Making mono_inst_name less misleading #83570
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Unroll Buffer.Memmove for constant lengths #83638
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: revise inlinee block numbering, enable synthesis for inlinees #83610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ToString handling of [Flags] enums with negative values #83616
  • Introducing Time abstraction Part1 #83604
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • JIT: stop copying EH tab info into inlinee compiler #83622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Do not run embuilder minimal build #83475
    area-Build-mono
  • [JIT] experiment - Ignore PHI nodes for `IfConversion` phase #83625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #83635
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Extend mstat format with information that maps to dependency nodes #83578
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Correct formatting of config binder generator #83614
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
